statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Rashun Davis had 20 points, nine assists, six rebounds and three steals on Wednesday night, and Radford beat Charleston Southern 80-73.
article.headline: Davis, Radford beat Charleston Southern 80-73
article.story: RADFORD, Va. -- Rashun Davis had 20 points, nine assists, six rebounds and three steals on Wednesday night, and Radford beat Charleston Southern 80-73. YaYa Anderson scored a game-high 23 with 5-of-11 3-point shooting and Caleb Tanner added 12 points for the Highlanders (9-7, 2-2 Big South Conference). Ed Polite Jr.'s dunk capped Radford's scoring at 80-61 with 4:07 left. Charleston Southern (5-10, 1-3) scored the last 12 while the Highlanders missed their last six shots, but the Buccaneers were unable to close within single digits until Demetrius Pollard's 3-pointer with 11 seconds left. Radford took control with a 19-0 run that started on Polite's basket at the 11:40 mark which broke a 55-all tie. Davis capped it with 6:22 left and a 74-55 Highlanders lead. Raemond Robinson led the Buccaneers with 15 points. Aaron Wheeler and Pollard added 12 points each.
